title: Ticket #6098: Implement condor_off -wait
description: We should implement the -wait option in condor_off. System shutdown requires waiting for the daemons to shutdown before proceeding. As currently implemented, the condor_off exits immediately after sending the shutdown message. The OS then kills the HTCondor daemons as the are coming down and logs several messages.
